{{html:
<div id="tabbable">
  <h2>My Machine Buckets</h2>
  <table id="machine_buckets_list"  class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <tr>
      <th>Status</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>IP Address</th>
      <th>Memory</th>
      <th>CPU</th>
      <th>Storage</th>
      <th>Number of Data Locations</th>
    </tr>
    <tbody>
      <tr ng-repeat="machine in machines">
        <td>{[machine.status]}</td>
        <td>
          <a ng-href="#/edit/{[machine.id]}">{[machine.name]}</a>
        </td>
        <td>{[machine.ip]}</td>
        <td>{[machine.memory]} GB</td>
        <td>{[machine.cpu]} <ng-pluralize count="machine.cpu" when="{'one': 'core', 'other': 'cores'}"></ng-pluralize></td>
        <td>{[machine.storage]} GB</td>
        <td>{[numOfDataLocations(machine)]}</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>
}}
